Quickstrike:





Quickstrike stood still. "Ah don't think that's uh good idea. See, 
Blackarachnia don't bluff. Ah reckon it's best ya stay still." He thought 
for a few seconds, for a moment not that clearly, with the drug getting in 
the way. What he had in mind was going to be risky. He grabbed Dark Mouse 
firmly around her arm.

He whispered as lowly as he could. "Now you listen t' me, jus' go along wit' 
me. Ah don't know if it's th' drug talkin' or ah'm jus' crazy."

>::DarkMouse::
>
>She heard the voice over the intercom. She looked at Quickstrike,"
>Quick, back into the vent shaft. I got an idea. Help me back into the
>shaft will ya.  Mice can't jump."
